title: To the person(s) going around down voting all the threads for no reason.

replies.body: they probably had they lunch stolen if they act like this

18 upvotes

18 / 3 = 6

6 + 6 + 6 = 18 = 666

HL3 confirmed

I downvoted this

Savage life

Should we keep downvoting every comment here now? I'm confused and conflicted.

~~Are downvotes that noticeable? Sweats nervously~~
I thought it's Riven mainers following me and revenging me with downvoting everything that I post.
Should you really post that on the thread where the OP has a Riven picture :P
Damn! You guys are everywhere!
Eat my lunch and I'll log onto my smurf and downvote those posts as well!
Log onto your smurf to downvote and I will eat your smurf's lunch.
as more than half the comments on the thread on downvoted 4 irony.
Logged on to u... oh wait, to downvote, you're right.

I only auto-down-vote M&G threads on the front page.
And the reason, is because M&G has a bad habit of taking up *most* of the front page.
There's, what, 3 ways to sort posts? Hot, New, Recent responses? If you don't like Hot posts, click on the thing that doesn't say Hot. See, was that really hard?
I am so happy that its not me... I enjoy my lunch.
I really think the downvote is real....

justice was served!
http://49.media.tumblr.com/0f658f1e49799e9daa08b72079254b80/tumblr_n08wx9j9La1rrkahjo9_r1_400.gif
It's probably not even their lunch.

Yeah come over!

Im always shearing my lunch, np.
not their virginity either
